posts.text: You are perfect!
posts.author: Phil

posts.text: You look beautiful today.

posts.text: You are amazing.

posts.text: Keep up the good work. You're doing great.

posts.text: I know you can do it!

posts.text: I believe in you.
posts.author: Marie

posts.text: It's great to be with you.

posts.text: Let's do our best again today to have a beautiful and fun day.

posts.text: Have a great and successful day.

posts.text: Hello again, good-looking. ;)

posts.text: May the Force be with you.

posts.text: Yes we can!

posts.text: Arigatou. That's Japanese for 'thank you' and I just wanted to tell you 'thank you'.

posts.text: Thanks for being the person you are.

posts.text: You are worthy of your dreams.

posts.text: I've got the power!

posts.text: You're so courageous. I admire that.

posts.text: Keep calm and hug the cat. ~(=^â€¥^)/
